page.topic: Using Show/Hide Expressions in a Page Layout
page.description: Show/hide expressions can be used to dynamically display content in a Page Layout Component.

discussion.p: You can use show/hide expressions in the Page Layout Component to display objects in the component. Show/hide expressions can session variables as well as arguments defined in the [Page Layout Component Properties]. Using show/hide expressions, it is easy to show one user a page with one particular set of components, and another user a completely different set of components.
Show/hide expressions are evaluated on the server before the content is sent to the client.
